divs: Sighting DetailsI first noticed these consistant weird lights in the Banning,Beaumont area insouthern california,and so i followed my instincts.I was led down a old roadsouthward on highland springs ave...until it was in the middle of the sanjacinto mountain range.It was in the middle of nowhere,or so i thoughtI stoppedat what i thought was a old shut down military bomb testing facility,BUT,I wasvery wrongIt had cattle gates,and a warning sign posted...Trespassers will beshot beyond this point.The sign read LOCKHEEDMARTIN.I thought that was weird fora place as remote as this.So my curiosity increased.It was dark,bout 730 pm thisnite,and so i just sat parked at the gate,to the side,watching and waiting tosee what would happen.As i sat there for about 15 minutes,i noticed many head ofcattle behind the security gates,and that really struck me as odd.I mean,whatwould lockheed need with cattle on the premisesAlso,i noticed what appeared tobe either motion detectors,and or sound detectors nestled over in the ruggedmountain side,and rocks...off to the sides of the cattle gates.So,at thispoint,I didnt dare get out of my van,as i was starting to get scared.Many,manygovernment vehicles like,limosines,hummers,and jeeps were back and forth intothis seemingly covert installation.All these vehicles had black tintedwindows..w gov. plates.I did see a couple military jeeps on the grounds.Prettyactive for a supposed shutdown base..,ehFinally,at about 800 that night,ithappenedThe lights appeared from the darn mountain or somethingAlmost like theground or mountain side opened and the craft was just THEREI observed this craftmove every direction in miliseconds seeminglyFunny part is,it see
